name: I Wanna Make A Game (ZEKA_G)
description:
Hey, this is my first game and this is my first time joining a game jam solo. I'm still learning unity, so this game is not that complicated. This game is a top-down shooter with a little bit of story. The story is about the journey of a person making a game.

Besides the explosion animation and bullets are from the itch asset store, everything is made by me (including the music, some pixel arts). It's a short game, hope you can get what the story is about.

I really enjoy making it; Hope you enjoy playing it, and thanks for playing my game :)

Oh, and feel free to comment and give all your ideas about this, thank you a lot!!
